detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract XenonCore (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XenonCore.sol#80-205) has payable functions:
	 - XenonCore.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XenonCore.sol#96-98)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	 - [XenonCore.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XenonCore.sol#L96-L98)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
